text: International and Domestic Arbitration Centre India (IDAC India) is a professionally managed, Institutional Arbitration Centre offering domestic and international arbitration administration services. It is incorporated as a non-profit company under Section 8 of the Indian Companies Act, 2013. ==Organisational Structure== The Centre comprises three primary organs: *Board of Directors **Public welfare minded persons from the legal and Chamber of commerce back ground *Registry **Administrative staff of the Centre, who handle the day-to-day activities of the Centre *Advisory Committee **It is Headed by a Former Chief Justice of High Court **Members from 10 different jurisdictions from all over the World. ==References== Category:Arbitration organizations Category:Organisations based in India
title: International and Domestic Arbitration Centre India
